description: Schema for ML Service Request Data

category.description: user interaction type of response given by service

action.description: current application the result is intended to satisfy

modelName.description: name of the model used to compute the results

loginId.description: user id of the logged in user, null if anonymous

experiment.description: unique identifier of the experiment involved with the current request

message.description: if an error exists, the message for that error

timestamp.description: date and time the request was received
